name: cr-nmaster
description: CronMaster is a self-hosted task scheduler for running cron jobs with a visual dashboard. It includes logs, scheduling UI, alerting features, and collaborative management for automated workflows.
features: Visual Scheduling: Create cron jobs with intuitive dashboard. No cron syntax needed.
Job Monitoring: Track execution history and status. Full visibility into tasks.
Alert System: Get notified when jobs fail or succeed. Stay informed automatically.
Collaborative Management: Team access for shared workflow control. Work together efficiently.
Execution Logs: Detailed output from every job run. Debug issues quickly.
Self-Hosted: Run your task scheduler on your infrastructure. Complete control and privacy.
